title: Child protected from cyberbullying attempt
content:
Scenario: Child protected from cyberbullying attempt
    Given Emma participates in school reading club space
    When another student tries to post mean comments about Emma
    Then the guardian agent detects harmful intent before posting
    And the comment is prevented from reaching Emma
    And the space moderator is alerted to address the behavior
    And the student who posted receives appropriate intervention
    And Emma continues participating without being harmed
    And restorative process helps both students learn and grow
